Support Us

There are many ways you can help. Which type of user are you?



You are a school teacher, a robotics coach, a robotics team, or organization that uses our lessons. Make a donation for the amount your think our lessons are worth to you. As a thank you, we will send you the designs for our training mats. Email Us

You have time. You speak another language. You can help us translate content. Email Us

You are a professional who works in web design or a lawyer. You can help us improve our site. Email Us

You can always help spread the word or send in an email. Write a review and post pictures on Social Media and link to us. Email Us
